author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Muhammad Yunus: Nobel laureate sentenced to jail in Bangladesh
description: Supporters of the Bangladeshi economist say the case against him is politically motivated.
content:
A court in Bangladesh has sentenced the Nobel laureate Muhammad Yunus to six months in jail for violating the country's labour laws.
Prof Yunus has been a vocal critic of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasinâ€¦ [+2402 chars]
